column5: With the hustle and bustle of everyday life...and the rising costs of a simple fishing trip, its easy to forget what fishing should be all about.....Smiles and Friendships.  I took a step back in the year 2006, and simply had FUN!  Here's some pics from 2006 highlighting some bright smiles and great friendships                      Here's to great friendships and tight lines in 2007!  (time for the leafs game)
nice report!!!  And its 2-0 for the good guys!  Cheers!
I think you nailed that one right on the nose well put.good luck in 07
Amen Steve!  Been saying that all year.  Congrats on a great year.  Whopper
Awesome thread!  You are right....it's all about smiles and friendships...couldn't have said it better myself.  Best wishes to you as well in 2007...and I hope we see more posts from you!

Excellent topic and great pics Steve. Looks like you and your Buds had a lot of fun this past year. Staying with the topic, here's a pic that I took last fall. I forget this guys name, but he looked like he was having fun.
Wow, gotta agree with everyone else.  Perfectly said, its all about the friendship and good times, even if if the fish don't want to comply:    We still talk about how much fun that trip was.

I agree great post & i absolutley love the pictures.  Fishing has allways and will allways be about smiles and freindship for me. I  have met and made many great freinds just through fishing alone since i returned home to canada in 2001.
Looks like a great year Steve, all the best in 07!
Looking forward to seeing you and many other OFNers this sseason Steve.  Great thread!

Thats great Steve... '07 for me is gonna be about family.. got some great family trips planned, and the kids are the right age to go...  they kinda still listen... anyway, great post, although I hope you catch some decent fish in '07, some of those look kinda small..  .. lol
